content: The popular '90s sitcom "Friends" was set in which U.S. city?

"Friends," the iconic '90s sitcom, was primarily set in New York City, USA. The show revolved around a group of friends in their 20s and 30s who lived in Manhattan, exploring their lives, relationships, and careers against the vibrant backdrop of the Big Apple. Over its ten-season run, "Friends" became a global phenomenon, capturing the hearts of millions with its humor, relatable characters, and the enduring friendships at its core.
